text: Amit Agarwal is an Indian filmmaker and film producer. His notable works include M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (2016), Simran (2017), Astra (2012), and Raahgir – The Wayfarers (2019). == Career == Agarwal began his producing career with the drama film Astra in 2012. He gained nationwide recognition with the biographical sports drama M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story (2016), which starred Sushant Singh Rajput as the Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni. The film was a critical and commercial success. In 2017, he produced Simran, directed by Hansal Mehta and starring Kangana Ranaut. In 2019, he produced the art-house drama Raahgir – The Wayfarers, which was well received in film festival circuits. In recent years, he produced films such as Hemanter Aparanha (2024) and Sada Ronger Prithibi (2024). == Filmography == Year Title 2012 Astra 2016 M.S.
